alert.note: Alert for Morehouse (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:42AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Morehouse Parish through 1130 AM CDT... At 1041 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles north of Sterlington to 11 miles south of Farmerville. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bastrop around 1055 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Collinston, Mer Rouge and Oak Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
